SummaryEnglish: "Aren't you going to confess?" These feelings started from a single wrong phone number... To be confessed to by a girl you love underneath the "legendary tree" on high school graduation day... it's the "fluttering heart" theme that everybody can relate to that the smash hit love simulation game "Tokimeki Memorial" was based on. With the graduation ceremony just around the corner, the trembling feelings of Shiori Fujisaki, Miharu Tatebayashi, Saki Nijino, and other heroines are expressed through vivid images and music. A story full of “throbbing hearts” is about to unfold!
SummaryJapanese:
「告白、しないんですか？」
一本の間違い電話から、動き出す気持ち・・・

高校の卒業式の日に「伝説の樹」の下で大好きな女の子から告白を受ける・・・
誰もが思い当たる「胸のときめき」をテーマに大ヒットした恋愛シミュレーションゲーム「ときめきメモリアル」。

卒業式を間近にひかえ、藤崎詩織・館林見晴・虹野沙希ら
ヒロインたちの揺れ動く気持ちを、爽やかな映像と音楽で表現。
「ときめく心」あふれる物語が展開します！
